trans-unit.source: Error Messages

seg-source.mrk: Error Messages

target.mrk: Messages d'erreur

trans-unit.source: The following error messages can be displayed in the health check (<MadCap:xref href="#error_health_messages" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: The following error messages can be displayed in the health check (<MadCap:xref href="#error_health_messages" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Les messages d'erreur suivants peuvent être affichés dans les messages d'erreur (<MadCap:xref href="#error_health_messages" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

trans-unit.source: Description of error health messages

seg-source.mrk: Description of error health messages

target.mrk: Description des messages d'erreur

trans-unit.source: Name

seg-source.mrk: Name

target.mrk: Nom

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: There are too many ALN agents: X (exceeding the limit of Y).

seg-source.mrk: There are too many ALN agents: X (exceeding the limit of Y).

target.mrk: Il y a trop d'agents ALN: X (en excès de la limite de Y).

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents has been reached. Remove unused agents, or add a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

seg-source.mrk: The maximum number of <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents has been reached.
Remove unused agents, or add a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

target.mrk: Le nombre maximum d’agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> a été atteint.
Supprimez les agents inutilisés ou ajoutez un serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Bypass of ALN startup consistency is active

seg-source.mrk: Bypass of ALN startup consistency is active

target.mrk: Le by-pass de la cohérence au démarrage d'ALN est actif

trans-unit.source: The HN_SERVER_INITCHECK_ISFATAL=false tunable is used in the parameters file. Service starts even if some agent databases are corrupted.

seg-source.mrk: The HN_SERVER_INITCHECK_ISFATAL=false tunable is used in the parameters file.
Service starts even if some agent databases are corrupted.

target.mrk: Le paramètre HN_SERVER_INITCHECK_ISFATAL=false est présent dans votre fichier de paramètres.
Le service démarre même si certaines bases de données agent sont corrompues.

trans-unit.source: Not enough disk space for <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Not enough disk space for <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Pas assez d'espace disque pour <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: At least 10 GB of disk space must be permanently available on the volume where the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> data is stored. This volume is running out of disk space. Contact your customer support if you can not add more free space.

seg-source.mrk: At least 10 GB of disk space must be permanently available on the volume where the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> data is stored.
This volume is running out of disk space.
Contact your customer support if you can not add more free space.

target.mrk: Au moins 10 Go d'espace disque doivent être disponibles en permanence sur le volume où les données <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sont stockées.
Ce volume n’a plus assez d’espace disque libre.
Contactez votre support client si vous ne pouvez pas rajouter d’espace libre.

trans-unit.source: Required configuration level is C[0-4]. Database must be stored on an SSD.

seg-source.mrk: Required configuration level is C[0-4].
Database must be stored on an SSD.

target.mrk: Le niveau de configuration requis est C[0-4].
La base de données doit être stockée sur SSD.

trans-unit.source: To find out the list of supported configurations, see <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Prerequisites_Lina_Server_installation.htm">Prerequisites to [%=ALN.aln%] Server Installation</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_HSS/HSS_Sizing_Recommendations.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1097828" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuration Types</MadCap:xref>. Some configurations require SSD devices.

seg-source.mrk: To find out the list of supported configurations, see <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Prerequisites_Lina_Server_installation.htm">Prerequisites to [%=ALN.aln%] Server Installation</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_HSS/HSS_Sizing_Recommendations.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1097828" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuration Types</MadCap:xref>.
Some configurations require SSD devices.

target.mrk: Pour connaître la liste des configurations prises en charge, voir <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Prerequisites_Lina_Server_installation.htm">Prerequisites to [%=ALN.aln%] Server Installation</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_HSS/HSS_Sizing_Recommendations.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1097828" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuration Types</MadCap:xref>.
Certaines configurations nécessitent des disques SSD.

trans-unit.source: This configuration level is not supported.

seg-source.mrk: This configuration level is not supported.

target.mrk: Ce niveau de configuration n'est pas supporté.

trans-unit.source: This configuration is no more supported because it does not fit the requirements enumerated in Configuration Types. Contact your customer support for further assistance.

seg-source.mrk: This configuration is no more supported because it does not fit the requirements enumerated in Configuration Types.
Contact your customer support for further assistance.

target.mrk: Ce niveau de configuration n'est pas supporté car il ne respecte pas les conditions préalables.
Contactez votre support client pour toute aide complémentaire.

trans-unit.source: Repositories are full.

seg-source.mrk: Repositories are full.

target.mrk: Les espaces de stockage sont pleins.

trans-unit.source: No more block can be added. You must add new repositories to backup additional data. Contact your customer support if you cannot add more free space.

seg-source.mrk: No more block can be added.
You must add new repositories to backup additional data.
Contact your customer support if you cannot add more free space.

target.mrk: Plus aucun bloc ne peut être écrit.
Vous devez ajouter des espaces de stockage afin de pouvoir sauvegarder plus de données.
Contactez votre support client si vous ne pouvez pas ajouter plus d’espace libre.

trans-unit.source: Estimate: Repositories will be full in X days.

seg-source.mrk: Estimate: Repositories will be full in X days.

target.mrk: Estimation : Les espaces de stockage seront pleins dans X jours.

trans-unit.source: Add free space to avoid the Repositories are full issue.

seg-source.mrk: Add free space to avoid the Repositories are full issue.

target.mrk: Ajoutez de l’espace libre pour éviter l’erreur de type Les espaces de stockage sont pleins.

trans-unit.source: Repository is located on a remote volume.

seg-source.mrk: Repository is located on a remote volume.

target.mrk: L'espace de stockage est situé sur un volume distant.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to use an ext4 file system on Linux servers and NTFS on Windows servers.

seg-source.mrk: It is recommended to use an ext4 file system on Linux servers and NTFS on Windows servers.

target.mrk: Il est recommandé d'utiliser un système de fichiers ext4 sur les serveurs Linux et NTFS sur les serveurs Windows.

trans-unit.source: Repository is not on a journaling file system.

seg-source.mrk: Repository is not on a journaling file system.

target.mrk: L'espace de stockage n'est pas sur un système de fichiers journalisé.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to use an ext4 file system on Linux servers and NTFS on Windows servers.

seg-source.mrk: It is recommended to use an ext4 file system on Linux servers and NTFS on Windows servers.

target.mrk: Il est recommandé d'utiliser un système de fichiers ext4 sur les serveurs Linux et NTFS sur les serveurs Windows.

trans-unit.source: Repository has no pre-allocation feature.

seg-source.mrk: Repository has no pre-allocation feature.

target.mrk: L'espace de stockage ne possède pas de fonction de pré-allocation.

trans-unit.source: The ext4 file system can pre-allocate on-disk space for a file. If you are using an ext4 file system, check that partition has the Extents extension enabled.

seg-source.mrk: The ext4 file system can pre-allocate on-disk space for a file.
If you are using an ext4 file system, check that partition has the Extents extension enabled.

target.mrk: Le système de fichiers ext4 peut pré-allouer de l'espace sur le disque pour un fichier.
Si vous utilisez un système de fichiers ext4, vérifiez que l’extension Extents est activée pour cette partition.

trans-unit.source: The database is stored in a remote location.

seg-source.mrk: The database is stored in a remote location.

target.mrk: La base de données est stockée sur un volume distant.

trans-unit.source: To ensure optimum reliability and performance, the database must be stored on a local disk. Atempo recommends using an SSD device.

seg-source.mrk: To ensure optimum reliability and performance, the database must be stored on a local disk.
Atempo recommends using an SSD device.

target.mrk: Pour assurer une fiabilité et des performances optimales, la base de données doit être stockée sur un disque local.
Atempo recommande d'utiliser un disque SSD.

trans-unit.source: Index page size is too big. Perform a shrink operation to avoid excessive RAM usage.

seg-source.mrk: Index page size is too big.
Perform a shrink operation to avoid excessive RAM usage.

target.mrk: La taille de la page d'index est trop grande.
Veuillez la réduire à l'aide de la commande : shrink, pour éviter une utilisation excessive de RAM.

trans-unit.source: Index page size has changed following a server upgrade from 2.x to 3.x. It is recommended to perform a shrink operation, as described in <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_HSS/HSS_Upgrade.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1097523" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Index Page Size too Large</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Index page size has changed following a server upgrade from 2.x to 3.x.

It is recommended to perform a shrink operation, as described in <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_HSS/HSS_Upgrade.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1097523" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Index Page Size too Large</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: La taille de la page d'index a changé à la suite d’une mise à jour du serveur d’une version 2.x à une version 3.x.

Atempo recommande de réaliser une opération Shrink, comme décrit dans <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_HSS/HSS_Upgrade.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1097523" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Index Page Size too Large</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Repair was not totally finished: reference counters are fuzzy.

seg-source.mrk: Repair was not totally finished: reference counters are fuzzy.

target.mrk: Le processus de réparation n'est pas entièrement terminé : les compteurs de référence sont flous.

trans-unit.source: A repair operation was running and has been aborted. Reference counters are not reliable. Run the counter tool to rebuild reference counters as described in <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="import-link:appendix_maintenance_229154286_15352" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:appendix_maintenance_229154286_15352"><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087830" target="_blank">Counter Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText></MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Health_Check_Error_Messa.htm" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:hss_appendix_maintenance_412228520_15352" target="_blank">Health Check Error Messages</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText>. The compact service is stopped until the operation is complete.

seg-source.mrk: A repair operation was running and has been aborted.
Reference counters are not reliable.

Run the counter tool to rebuild reference counters as described in <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="import-link:appendix_maintenance_229154286_15352" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:appendix_maintenance_229154286_15352"><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087830" target="_blank">Counter Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText></MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Health_Check_Error_Messa.htm" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:hss_appendix_maintenance_412228520_15352" target="_blank">Health Check Error Messages</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText>.
The compact service is stopped until the operation is complete.

target.mrk: Une opération repair en cours d’exécution a été annulée.
Les compteurs de référence ne sont plus fiables.

Exécutez l'outil Counter pour reconstruire les compteurs de référence comme décrit dans <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="import-link:appendix_maintenance_229154286_15352" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:appendix_maintenance_229154286_15352"><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087830" target="_blank">Counter Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText></MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Health_Check_Error_Messa.htm" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:hss_appendix_maintenance_412228520_15352" target="_blank">Health Check Error Messages</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText>.
Le service compact est arrêté jusqu'à ce que l'opération soit terminée.

trans-unit.source: HSS product is not enabled on destination so HSS replication is denied.

seg-source.mrk: HSS product is not enabled on destination so HSS replication is denied.

target.mrk: La réplication HSS n'est pas autorisée car le produit HSS n'est pas activé sur la destination.

trans-unit.source: Enable HSS to allow source replication server to send data.

seg-source.mrk: Enable HSS to allow source replication server to send data.

target.mrk: Activez HSS pour autoriser le serveur source de la réplication à envoyer des données.

trans-unit.source: The hss.min_space_left tunable is below the minimum requirement of X.

seg-source.mrk: The hss.min_space_left tunable is below the minimum requirement of X.

target.mrk: Le paramètre hss.min_space_left est positionné en dessous de la valeur minimum requise de X.

trans-unit.source: To prevent a full repository, this tunable should not be set to less than 64GB. This amount of free space is enough to run a compact task.

seg-source.mrk: To prevent a full repository, this tunable should not be set to less than 64GB.
This amount of free space is enough to run a compact task.

target.mrk: Afin d’éviter que les espaces de stockage ne soient pleins, ce paramètre ne doit pas être positionné à moins de 64 Go.
Cet espace disque libre est suffisant pour lancer une tâche de compact.

trans-unit.source: DB disk is almost full

seg-source.mrk: DB disk is almost full

target.mrk: Le disque de la DB est presque plein

trans-unit.source: The ADE Database disk is almost full. Add free space or move database to another SSD with more space.

seg-source.mrk: The ADE Database disk is almost full.
Add free space or move database to another SSD with more space.

target.mrk: Le disque de la base de données ADE est presque plein.
Ajoutez de l’espace, ou déplacez la base de données vers un autre SSD disposant de plus d’espace libre.

trans-unit.source: There are X missing blocks in block files

seg-source.mrk: There are X missing blocks in block files

target.mrk: Il y a X blocs manquants dans les fichiers de blocs

trans-unit.source: Run the ade_server --repair counter command to fix this issue. See Counter ToolCounter Tool for details.

seg-source.mrk: Run the ade_server --repair counter command to fix this issue.

See <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087830">Counter Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087830">Counter Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText> for details.

target.mrk: Exécutez la commande ade_server --repair counter pour corriger ce problème.

Voir <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087830">Counter Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087830">Counter Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: X records cannot be removed (inconsistent reference counter)

seg-source.mrk: X records cannot be removed (inconsistent reference counter)

target.mrk: X enregistrements ne peuvent pas être supprimés (compteur de référence incohérent)

trans-unit.source: Run the ade_server --repair command to fix this issue. See Repair ToolRepair Tool for details.

seg-source.mrk: Run the ade_server --repair command to fix this issue.

See <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087812">Repair Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087812">Repair Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText> for details.

target.mrk: Exécutez la commande ade_server --repair pour corriger ce problème.

Voir <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087812">Repair Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:xref href="Repair.htm#appendix_maintenance_2072635088_1087812">Repair Tool</MadCap:xref></MadCap:conditionalText> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: New important release available

seg-source.mrk: New important release available

target.mrk: Nouvelle version importante disponible

trans-unit.source: Download and install the new release.

seg-source.mrk: Download and install the new release.

target.mrk: Téléchargez la nouvelle version et installez-la.
